Player History
Drafted in 33rd round, 517th overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2015, off Tanner Campbell (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2015, off Danilo Mota (KC)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/26/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $1,450,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Atlanta on 10/7/2016.
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/14/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Brooklyn on 6/26/2018.
Released by Brooklyn on 10/3/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/16/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $945,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
